divs: Sighting DetailsI just went outside to throw some trash saw something bright in the sky, thought it was a helicopter since helicopter activity has been increased the past few months. Went back outside 5 minutes later and it was in the same exact spot, it pulsated blue and yellow then started to flicker, then dim then suddenly dissappear and i could see the clouds behind it very clear like it just vanished so i know it wasnt a helicopter because there was no noise and it wasn't a plan because it was just low enough not to be a plane and also it just vanished into thin air, father saw it as well.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Donna
There were no other sightings in Donna on or around December 4th 2011
